blog.name: gold-from-straw
blog.title: Gold-From-Straw
blog.description: Write novels on Amazon as Lyn Hemphill, fanfiction on AO3 as Lynds, and draw as and when I feel like it. Avatar is the front cover of Zero Degrees, which is my new book ^_^

title: Wicked Boys - ch31
body:
AAH I’m late! Sorry!! Hopefully Credence creeping out the Dursleys for fun will make up for it!


“Are you ready?” asked Credence.

Harry took a deep, shaky breath and nodded. “Yeah. Yeah, this is… God, this is huge. Definitely about time.”

Credence nodded and squeezed his shoulder. “I got your back.”

Harry clenched and unclenched his fists, then stood, jerkily, and crossed the road to 4 Privet Drive. Credence followed him, his head bull-lowered and his jaw jutting.

Harry knocked on the door, then bounced slightly on the balls of his feet, unable to stay still. Credence wanted to put his hand on his shoulder again, but there wasn’t enough space on the step. And he didn’t want to undermine him by drawing some sort of attention to his nerves.

The door opened to a thin woman with a fake social smile that disappeared the moment she saw Harry. Credence swallowed. God, but she looked like Ma. He made a particular effort to straighten his back. These were Harry’s demons, not his, and he was going to be as silently hateful and obnoxious as he could. If Harry was anything like him, which, sure, he might not be, he was probably going to fall back into old habits. Credence glared up at the woman, making sure he was projecting as much disgust as he could. He was delighted when her eyes slightly widened at the sight of him behind Harry.

“Vernon!”

“What is it, Petunia, I’m watching the telly.”

“Vernon, come here, it’s… it’s him.”

“I just want my stuff,” said Harry, and Credence was so proud of how steady his voice was.

A man appeared behind Petunia, and he seemed to puff up when he saw Harry, his walrus moustache bristling. “Well! You’ve got a bloody nerve.” he hissed. “You didn’t show up at the train station, not a word of warning. We were stood about for a good half an hour in that… that freak show, waiting for you, and—“

“Look,” said Harry. “If you just let me get my stuff, you’ll be rid of me forever.”

Petunia narrowed her eyes. “What about that awful headmaster of yours?”

Harry hesitated. “The situation’s changed. I don’t need to come here every year, so my godfather’s offered to take me in.”

“Your godfather? The criminal, eh?” growled Vernon. “Where is he? You haven’t brought him here, have you?”

“No,” said Harry, through gritted teeth.

Credence turned his eyes on Vernon, and tried not to blink too often. Vernon frowned at him, but drew back slightly, which Credence counted as a win. “Who’s this little freak, then?”

“This is Credence,” snapped Harry. “And he just fought in a battle against the greatest dark wizard of the century and won. Now can I please get my stuff and leave?”

Vernon narrowed his eyes, but stepped back towards the doorway to the living room. Petunia took her cue from him and backed away as well, wringing her hands together. A boy about their age came to stand beside Vernon, looking between them all uncertainly. Harry walked to a cupboard below the stairs and glanced at Credence out of the corner of his eye before pulling it open.

Credence almost missed it, so busy making evil eyes at the family that had hurt his best friend. Harry’s eyes closed briefly before he crouched down, and Credence noticed his breath speeding up ever so slightly as he leaned forwards. The door slipped and bumped him on the side, and he flinched violently.

He remembered a throwaway comment, a joke, I lived in a literal cupboard for eleven years. Harry had a habit of making things that hurt into things that could make others laugh, but it wasn’t enough to take the hurt away from himself. Credence held the door, bent it backwards until the hinges creaked. Petunia winced, and Credence allowed the slightest smile as he creaked it even further backwards, away from Harry as he collected little knick-knacks and pictures, broken toys and torn books from under a floorboard.

Read the rest of this chapter here, or start from the beginning here!

summary: Arthur Weasley is so cute with his obsession with muggle inventions. God, imagine his reaction to smartphone. A wholesome human...
body: Arthur Weasley is so cute with his obsession with muggle inventions. God, imagine his reaction to smartphone. A wholesome human being with wholesome hobby, being curious about how the muggles go by without magic. And he works in the Misuse of Muggle Artefacts Office, probably super happy with his job. Good for him.

summary: Ginny after her and Harry’s breakup: Being just friends means I don’t have to worry about my breath smelling like popcorn, hot...
body:
Ginny after her and Harry’s breakup: Being just friends means I don’t have to worry about my breath smelling like popcorn, hot sauce and pickle juice.

Harry: You never worried about that before.

Ginny: I know..

Ginny: I was a real catch, wasn’t I?

blog.name: ao3feed-wolfstar
blog.title: remus x sirius ao3 feed
blog.description: (I don't actually read all these fics or choose what comes on the blog, it's literally just a feed of the ao3 ship tag sorry)

title: The Three Abstracts
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LYNkdJ

by PseftisIncertus

Severus Snape just lost his mother and is having nightmares. Pomfrey decided to give him a parchment to write about his feelings about Time, Love and Death, and another for his everyday struggles. Will it help soothe just his pain or will it change his life altogether?

I’m not good with summaries but just an overview, its a Harry Potter x Collateral Beauty x Dear Evan Hansen plot if you squint, please don’t expect too much. Enjoy :)

Words: 3051, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling, Jeverus - Fandom
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: James Potter, Severus Snape, Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, Lily Evans, Horace Slughorn, Minerva McGonagall, Poppy Pomfrey, Lucius Malfoy
  • Relationships: James Potter/Severus Snape, Sirius Black/Remus Lupin
  • Additional Tags: Just another Jeverus, Exchange letters


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LYNkdJ

summary: I don't think Snape is insufferable to everybody under his authority. He has good relations with Filch, for example. That breaks...
body: I don’t think Snape is insufferable to everybody under his authority. He has good relations with Filch, for example. That breaks a pattern. The children that get on his nerves however, I think, are a special case. He uses his teaching persona to intimidate and control a class. But he could have been nasty to the cleaning staff and he’s clearly not. So I don’t personally see him a the type to be rude to waiters and such, as some antis have suggested. What do you think?

summary:
Draco: Potter! This lad is being rude to me
Harry: Don't be rude to him, lad
Draco: ... I was expecting something more......
body:
Draco: Potter! This lad is being rude to me
Harry: Don't be rude to him, lad
Draco: ... I was expecting something more... spectacular, you know? Like an a "Don't talk to my man, you prat" and then a Stupefy or something
Harry: "Don't talk to my man"? "You prat"? That's spectacular to you? And I thought you were difficult to impress

dialogue.name: Draco
dialogue.label: Draco:
dialogue.phrase: Potter! This lad is being rude to me

dialogue.name: Harry
dialogue.label: Harry:
dialogue.phrase: Don't be rude to him, lad

dialogue.name: Draco
dialogue.label: Draco:
dialogue.phrase: ... I was expecting something more... spectacular, you know? Like an a "Don't talk to my man, you prat" and then a Stupefy or something

dialogue.name: Harry
dialogue.label: Harry:
dialogue.phrase: "Don't talk to my man"? "You prat"? That's spectacular to you? And I thought you were difficult to impress

summary: Do you have any good sick harry fics? I've been looking everywhere and only found 3. I'm desperate
question: Do you have any good sick harry fics? I've been looking everywhere and only found 3. I'm desperate
answer:
YES! YES! Oh hell, yes! Although, I guess some of these are more ‘injuries’ than an illness, but yeah…

Balance, Imperfect by (Explicit, 91 K)

Summary: When Harry sustains an injury in the line of work, he no longer knows how to navigate the life he loved, and finds help and solace from the most unexpected source.

The Price of Valour by orphan_account, RomanyWalker, wench_fics (WeasleyWench) (Explicit, 406 K)

Summary: What happens when someone you hate needs you more than anything else? When it’s life or death, either battle to the end, or die trying. DH compliant, but ignores the Epilogue.

All Life is Yours to Miss by Saras_Girl (Mature, 114 K)

Summary: Professor Malfoy’s world is contained, controlled, and as solitary as he can make it, but when an act of petty revenge goes horribly awry, he and his trusty six-legged friend are thrown into Hogwarts life at the deep end and must learn to live, love and let go.

Silenced by the Night by parkkate (Mature, 55 K)

Summary: After a spell goes horribly wrong, Harry has to deal with the loss of his eyesight. It’s such terrible timing, too, because how is he supposed to find out what Malfoy has been up to in the Room of Requirement? It’s not like he can ask the git, not only because it’s Malfoy, but also because the Slytherin has suddenly lost his voice. While they’re both trapped in the hospital wing, however, Harry discovers there’s so much he didn’t know about Malfoy, and it’s highly intriguing, but also a bit alarming. Where did all these confusing feelings come from all of a sudden? And what is Harry going to do about them?

And there’s this one which I have not read and am not going to because I just don’t think that I can handle it mentally. Although I’m sure it’s absolutely brilliant. I read a few paragraphs and broke down in tears to be honest with you. 

A Certain Kind of Memory by jamie2109 (Mature, 96 K)

So, from what I can gather from what I read Harry has a brain tumour and….you know what? I have to go to work in half an hour and I can’t talk about this without crying. I SUCK at Major Character Death fics. 

I’ve got bookmarked a bunch of fics involving mental illnesses too but I’m thinking that’s not what you’re looking for? If you are though, shoot me another ask and I’ll get back to you when I get home from work in about, six hours. Anyway, I hope you enjoy these Nonnie. 

Love to you Xx
